dict.acceptation: 感谢，谢谢；感谢，谢谢，道谢的话( thank的名词复数 )；
谢谢，感谢( thank的第三人称单数 )；责怪；

sent.orig: Thanks for looking at my auctions!
Thanks for coming. Be seated. Thanks for coming. Welcome to the White House. Thanks for coming.
sent.trans: 谢谢你们的光临。请坐。谢谢你们的光临。欢迎来到白宫。谢谢你们的光临。

sent.orig: Thanks, my child. Thanks, Daisy. Thanks, God of Death.
sent.trans: 谢谢，我的孩子。谢谢，黛丝。谢谢，死神。

sent.orig: No thanks to me. It's Mrs. Lin who deserves the thanks.
sent.trans: 不要谢我，要感谢的，应该是林太太。

sent.orig: Thanks for your concern, I do understand all your support. Iwillkeep myself and strong. Thanks again.
sent.trans: 谢谢大家的关心，我知道大家在用各种方式来支持我，我会坚强的。再次谢谢大家。
